body_text: I think Immutable has some special hooks so that you can just do JSON.stringify(value). It will give the same result as calling .toJS() first. If that's true, I don't think we even need this method.
body: I think Immutable has some special hooks so that you can just do `JSON.stringify(value)`. It will give the same result as calling `.toJS()` first. If that's true, I don't think we even need this method.
body_html: I think Immutable has some special hooks so that you can just do JSON.stringify(value). It will give the same result as calling .toJS() first. If that's true, I don't think we even need this method.
